attributes.action: Stop Immigrarion until our NHS and public services are fit for purpose.
attributes.additional_details: I believe it is the right of the Government to protect the Health and welfare of it's citizens as a top priority and stop legal & ilegal immigration until the health service and other public services are fit for purpose.
attributes.background:
Our NHS and public services are under severe pressure from legal & ilegal immigration,
Waiting lists for operations are at an all time high while other public services are critical through underfunding.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700824
